info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 15 at 2:43PM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible, sleet accumulations around one quarter of an inch, and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west central Illinois. Portions of northeast Missouri. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
